doc:
Vic Perrin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vic_Perrin 0 Victor Herbert Perrin (April 26, 1916 – July 4, 1989) was an American actor, best remembered for having provided the "Control Voice" in the original version of the television series The Outer Limits (1963–1965). Victor_Herbert_Perrin ( April_26_,_1916 – July_4_,_1989 ) was an_American_actor , best remembered for having_provided the_"_Control_Voice " in the_original_version of the_television_series The_Outer Limits ( 1963 – 1965 ) .
